Description and instructions

  • Volker J. Schmid, Marion Cremer, Thomas Cremer: Quantitative analyses of the 3D nuclear landscape recorded with super-resolved fluorescence microscopy. Methods 123 (2017) 33-46. [DOI]

Nucleus 5:6 (2014) 555–589. [DOI]
